actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on 1, 4- Benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2- [[1- [[( 2, 3- di-hydro-2-oxo-1H- benzimidazol-5-yl) amino carbonyl]-2-oxopropyl] azo]-, dimethyl ester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on 1,4- 1,4-benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2-((1-(((2,3-di-hydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol- 5-yl)amino carbonyl)-2-oxopropyl)azo)-, dimethyl ester.

titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on 1, 4- Benzenedicarboxylic acid, 2- [[1- [[( 2, 3- di-hydro-2-oxo-1H- benzimidazol-5-yl) amino carbonyl]-2-oxopropyl] azo]-, dimethyl ester.
